central_authority.name: Office of Information Practices (OIP)
central_authority.role: Administers UIPA, provides guidance, handles appeals
central_authority.address: No. 1 Capitol District Building, 250 South Hotel Street, Suite 107, Honolulu, HI 96813

response_deadlines.partial_records_notice: 10 business days for notice, then 5 business days for disclosure
response_deadlines.personal_records: 10 working days (extendable to 30 days with explanation)

template.subject: UIPA Request - [SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION]
template.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Hawaii Uniform Information Practices Act (UIPA), Hawaii Revised Statutes Chapter 92F, I respectfully request access to the following government records:

[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS REQUESTED]

This request is made under the UIPA, which provides that "[a]ll government records are open to public inspection unless access is restricted or closed by law." HRS ยง 92F-11(b).

Please provide the records in the following format: [SPECIFY: copies, electronic format, inspection, etc.]

If any portion of this request is exempt from disclosure, please identify the specific exemption and provide any segregable portions that can be released.

Please acknowledge receipt of this request within 10 business days and provide the responsive records within the time frame required by UIPA and administrative rules.

If you have any questions about this request, please contact me at:
[YOUR CONTACT INFORMATION]

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
